descriptor.name: (Pack of 3) Pepsodent Germicheck Mouth Rinse and Mouth Wash Liquid - Fights COVID-19 Coronavirus in 30s -3x500ml
descriptor.short_desc: About this product Pepsodent Germi Check Mouth Rinse with CPC technology fights COVID 19 cornona virus in 30s CPC cetylpyridinium chloride also helps protect against harmful bacteria and germs
descriptor.long_desc: About this product Pepsodent Germi Check Mouth Rinse with CPC technology fights COVID 19 cornona virus in 30s CPC cetylpyridinium chloride also helps protect against harmful bacteria and germs that cause plaque gingivitis and bad breath This powerful mouth rinse is also enriched with fluoride so you and your family aged 12 and up can enjoy strong teeth healthy gums and smiles for years to come Our unique gentle formula is alcoholfree and offers pleasantly fresh breath Follow a good dental care routine for best results 1 Brush day and night with Pepsodent toothpaste and toothbrush 2 Rinse and gargle with Pepsodent Germi Check Mouth Rinse twice a day for deepclean effectiveness Based on a clinical study on mucous cells with regular use Ethyl alcohol Pack of 3
